resources.string: Check out the official FB page of the app!

"ITM University" is an android application made for students of ITM University to get all the latest updates on the go. They can easily stay updated about latest announcements, notices and results as soon as they are updated on the main website.
Application made by Bhavyanshu Parasher. Contact me @ bhavyanshu.spl@gmail.com

Society of Programming Languages (www.thespl.in) - Founded on: 31/10/2011 by Bhavya Kaushal Jatwani & Vinit Gulia with the help of magnanimous Senior Prof. (Dr) Prabha Sharma. By the time Dr. Latika Singh as Patron also joined.
Dr. Gaurav Gupta (Faculty coordinator, S.P.L R & D)
Remote Image might take some time to load. Please wait!
You must have an internet connection to run this application. That\'s all what is required. And also you can get the adobe pdf viewer by clicking the image below.
Only 999 characters are allowed. Ask whatever you wish to ask!

"I take no responsibility and assume no liability for any content posted by the students using this application. It is for free flow of information and will always be. This application might suffer unexpected force close due to server downtime as it is currently consuming free hosting service."- Bhavyanshu Parasher (Developer)
Know the answer? Just select the question you want to answer.
Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
Device is already registered on server.
From GCM: Add a google account in your device settings to use notification feature. error (%1$s).
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on Server.
Could not register device on Server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on Server (%1$s).

Before registering make sure you have added your google email account in your device settings. To do that go to Settings>Account & Sync>Add your gmail account. This is only one time registration and it unlocks the feature of live notifications.
